page.title: 03Nature in the Locality
page.content: In and around the River Eden there are many species of{wild life.}On the river are moorhens and ducks,while in the river there are frogs and many {fish}like salmon, trout, pike and eels. Around Pitlessie village are many wooded areas where{woodland creatures can be found.There are red and roe deer,badgers,squirrels,rabbits and foxes. Of the many bird species inhabiting the woods the most outstanding are owls and pheasants. This grid area has many farms and the cultivated land is edged by hedgerows where many harvest mice and other small creatures live .There are also a lot of streams where you will find many species of{marsh plants,}and wild flowers are in abundance all around .
